headline: How FactSet’s New AI and Cloud Partnerships Could Shape FactSet Research Systems (FDS) Investors
summary: In early December 2025, FactSet revealed that its market intelligence is now available through Amazon Quick Research and confirmed a new partnership with Arcesium to offer a unified, cloud-native investment management platform spanning front, middle, and back office workflows. Together, these moves highlight FactSet’s push deeper into AI-enabled, cloud-based solutions that aim to simplify increasingly complex, multi-asset investment operations for institutional clients. Next, we’ll examine...
